text: Brugg is a district in the Canton of Aargau, Switzerland, it is south of the Aare and the Aargauer Jura covers the district. The capital of the district is Brugg. It contains the following municipalities: Coat of arms Municipality Population (31 December 2004) Area (km²) Auenstein 1,445 5.68 Birr 3,751 5.05 Birrhard 657 3.00 Bözen 640 3.96 Brugg 9,212 5.58 Effingen 602 6.85 Elfingen 248 4.21 Gallenkirch 128 1.37 Habsburg 399 2.23 Hausen bei Brugg 2,638 3.21 Hottwil 251 4.16 Linn 144 2.54 Lupfig 1,936 5.15 Mandach 308 5.54 Mönthal 404 3.94 Mülligen 840 3.16 Oberbözberg 520 5.45 Oberflachs 456 3.38 Remigen 1,034 7.87 Riniken 1,384 4.76 Rüfenach 794 4.17 Scherz 579 3.30 Schinznach-Bad 1,278 1.90 Schinznach-Dorf 1704 8.91 Thalheim 777 9.92 Umiken 1,066 0.80 Unterbözberg 711 6.11 Veltheim 1,382 5.24 Villigen 1,826 11.21 Villnachern 1,364 5.75 Windisch 6,657 4.91 Localities of * Lauffohr Category:Brugg District
